name: Gestational Age Data
description: Dataset containing gestational age, parental demographics, prenatal care information, and infant birth outcomes.

columns.name: fage
columns.description: Age of the infant’s father at the time of birth, measured in years.

columns.name: mage
columns.description: Age of the infant’s mother at the time of birth, measured in years.

columns.name: mature
columns.description: Categorical indicator of whether the mother is a younger or mature mother.

columns.name: weeks
columns.description: Length of the pregnancy measured in completed weeks of gestation.

columns.name: premie
columns.description: Indicates whether the birth was full term or premature.

columns.name: visits
columns.description: Number of prenatal care visits attended by the mother during pregnancy.

columns.name: weight
columns.description: Weight of the infant at birth, typically measured in grams.

columns.name: lowbirthweight
columns.description: Categorical indicator of whether the infant’s birth weight is classified as low.

columns.name: sex
columns.description: Biological sex of the infant at birth.

columns.name: habit
columns.description: Indicates whether the mother smoked during pregnancy.

columns.name: marital
columns.description: Marital status of the mother at the time of birth.

columns.name: whitemom
columns.description: Indicates whether the mother identifies as White.

columns.name: WeightGain
columns.description: Categorical classification of the mother’s weight gain during pregnancy.
